pageProduct.name: Swisse Ultiboost Joint Pain Relief 90 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Swisse Ultiboost Joint Pain Relief is a premium quality formula containing glucosamine and MSM to help reduce joint pain and swelling associated with osteoarthritis of the knee, along with turmeric for its antioxidant properties.

BENEFITS:



Glucosamine + MSM + Turmeric



Joint Pain & Swelling: Dimethyl sulfone (MSM) helps reduce joint pain and swelling associated with osteoarthritis of the knee.

Osteoarthritis Symptom Relief: Osteoarthritis is characterised by cartilage loss. Glucosamine assists in the management and symptomatic relief of joint pain associated with osteoarthritis.

Cartilage Health: Glucosamine occurs naturally in the body and plays a key role in the formation of cartilage - the connective tissue that cushions joints and helps maintain cartilage health. Glucosamine helps maintain elasticity and strength of cartilage in joints.

Joint Health & Mobility: Glucosamine sulfate helps joint mobility and flexibility, helping to maintain healthy joint function.

Antioxidant: Turmeric contains curcuminoids, antioxidant compounds, which help protect against free radicals.

Clinically Tested: Clinical trials demonstrate positive results for the symptomatic relief of osteoarthritis when using glucosamine sulfate, rather than some other forms of glucosamine.

Swisse Ultiboost Joint Pain Relief has been formulated based on scientific evidence to provide key ingredients beneficial for joint pain relief in a convenient dose.

Size: 90 Pack

Warnings

If symptoms persist consult your healthcare practitioner. Derived from seafood. The recommended daily dose of this medicine contains 161.25 mg of sodium.

Ingredients

EACH TABLET CONTAINS:

GLUCOSAMINE SULFATE 500 mg (from glucosamine sulfate sodium chloride complex 628.61 mg)

MSM (as dimethyl sulfone) 500 mg

TURMERIC (Curcuma longa) standardised extract equiv. dry rhizome 500 mg (equiv. curcuminoids 16.25 mg)

Directions

ADULT DOSAGE:

One tablet, three times daily, during or immediately after a meal, or as directed by a healthcare professional.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 25 degrees Celsius. Do not use if cap seal is broken.
